trans-unit.source: Associating Multiple Login IDs with a BizTalk Services Deployment
trans-unit.target: Associating Multiple Login IDs with a BizTalk Services Deployment

trans-unit.source: You can associate multiple accounts with the same <token>af_integration</token> deployment or you can associate multiple <token>af_integration</token> deployments with a single account.
trans-unit.target: You can associate multiple accounts with the same <token>af_integration</token> deployment or you can associate multiple <token>af_integration</token> deployments with a single account.

trans-unit.source: This topic provides instructions on how to perform many-to-many association between accounts and <token>af_integration</token> deployments.
trans-unit.target: This topic provides instructions on how to perform many-to-many association between accounts and <token>af_integration</token> deployments.

trans-unit.source: The first time you register, the BizTalk Service deployment is automatically associated with the Microsoft Account (Live.com, Outlook.com, Hotmail.com) or the Work account you are logged in as.
trans-unit.target: The first time you register, the BizTalk Service deployment is automatically associated with the Microsoft Account (Live.com, Outlook.com, Hotmail.com) or the Work account you are logged in as.

trans-unit.source: Once this association is done, only an account within the same work OR a Microsoft account has access to the BizTalk Services deployment.
trans-unit.target: Once this association is done, only an account within the same work OR a Microsoft account has access to the BizTalk Services deployment.

trans-unit.source: It cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: It cannot be changed.

trans-unit.source: <legacyBold>Example</legacyBold>: You registered a BizTalk Service deployment using a Microsoft account (user@live.com).
trans-unit.target: <legacyBold>Example</legacyBold>: You registered a BizTalk Service deployment using a Microsoft account (user@live.com).

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, only Microsoft Account users can manage the BizTalk Service using the BizTalk Services portal.
trans-unit.target: In this scenario, only Microsoft Account users can manage the BizTalk Service using the BizTalk Services portal.

trans-unit.source: A work account cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: A work account cannot be used.

trans-unit.source: <legacyBold>Example</legacyBold>: You registered a BizTalk Service deployment using a work account in an Azure Active Directory (user@contoso.com).
trans-unit.target: <legacyBold>Example</legacyBold>: You registered a BizTalk Service deployment using a work account in an Azure Active Directory (user@contoso.com).

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, only Azure Active Directory users within contoso can manage the BizTalk Service using the BizTalk Services portal.
trans-unit.target: In this scenario, only Azure Active Directory users within contoso can manage the BizTalk Service using the BizTalk Services portal.

trans-unit.source: A Microsoft account cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: A Microsoft account cannot be used.

trans-unit.source: To associate multiple accounts with a BizTalk Services deployment
trans-unit.target: To associate multiple accounts with a BizTalk Services deployment

trans-unit.source: If you have not registered the <token>af_integration</token> deployment, refer to <link xlink:href="7c9bae82-8d07-45df-bf51-b0b31417a9d4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Registering and Updating a BizTalk Service Deployment on the BizTalk Services Portal</link> before continuing.
trans-unit.target: If you have not registered the <token>af_integration</token> deployment, refer to <link xlink:href="7c9bae82-8d07-45df-bf51-b0b31417a9d4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Registering and Updating a BizTalk Service Deployment on the BizTalk Services Portal</link> before continuing.

trans-unit.source: From the Azure Management Portal, click <embeddedLabel><token>af_integration</token></embeddedLabel>, and select the <token>af_integration</token> subscription.
trans-unit.target: From the Azure Management Portal, click <embeddedLabel><token>af_integration</token></embeddedLabel>, and select the <token>af_integration</token> subscription.

trans-unit.source: From the command bar, click <embeddedLabel>Manage</embeddedLabel> to launch the <token>tpm_portal</token>.
trans-unit.target: From the command bar, click <embeddedLabel>Manage</embeddedLabel> to launch the <token>tpm_portal</token>.

trans-unit.source: In the <token>tpm_portal</token>, click the <embeddedLabel>Settings</embeddedLabel> tab, click <embeddedLabel>Add</embeddedLabel>, and add the account that you want to associate with the <token>af_integration</token> deployment.
trans-unit.target: In the <token>tpm_portal</token>, click the <embeddedLabel>Settings</embeddedLabel> tab, click <embeddedLabel>Add</embeddedLabel>, and add the account that you want to associate with the <token>af_integration</token> deployment.

trans-unit.source: To remove an account associated with a <token>af_integration</token> deployment, select the account from the <embeddedLabel>Settings</embeddedLabel> tab, and click <embeddedLabel>Delete</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: To remove an account associated with a <token>af_integration</token> deployment, select the account from the <embeddedLabel>Settings</embeddedLabel> tab, and click <embeddedLabel>Delete</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: To associate multiple BizTalk Services deployment with a single account
trans-unit.target: To associate multiple BizTalk Services deployment with a single account

trans-unit.source: From the Azure Management Portal, click <embeddedLabel><token>af_integration</token></embeddedLabel>, and select the <token>af_integration</token> subscription.
trans-unit.target: From the Azure Management Portal, click <embeddedLabel><token>af_integration</token></embeddedLabel>, and select the <token>af_integration</token> subscription.

trans-unit.source: From the command bar, click <embeddedLabel>Manage</embeddedLabel> to launch the <token>tpm_portal</token>.
trans-unit.target: From the command bar, click <embeddedLabel>Manage</embeddedLabel> to launch the <token>tpm_portal</token>.

trans-unit.source: Depending on whether the account you logged in with is already associated with any <token>af_integration</token> subscriptions, you will have on of the following two options:
trans-unit.target: Depending on whether the account you logged in with is already associated with any <token>af_integration</token> subscriptions, you will have on of the following two options:

trans-unit.source: If you already have more than one <token>af_integration</token> subscription associated with the account you logged in with, you are routed to the <embeddedLabel>Register Account</embeddedLabel> page that lists all the <token>af_integration</token> subscriptions that are associated with the account you logged in with.
trans-unit.target: If you already have more than one <token>af_integration</token> subscription associated with the account you logged in with, you are routed to the <embeddedLabel>Register Account</embeddedLabel> page that lists all the <token>af_integration</token> subscriptions that are associated with the account you logged in with.

trans-unit.source: From the page, click <embeddedLabel>Register New Deployment</embeddedLabel> to register another <token>af_integration</token> subscription.
trans-unit.target: From the page, click <embeddedLabel>Register New Deployment</embeddedLabel> to register another <token>af_integration</token> subscription.

trans-unit.source: - OR -
trans-unit.target: - OR -

trans-unit.source: If the account you logged in with is only associated with one <token>af_integration</token> subscription, you are directly routed to the <embeddedLabel>Partners</embeddedLabel> page in <token>tpm_portal</token>.
trans-unit.target: If the account you logged in with is only associated with one <token>af_integration</token> subscription, you are directly routed to the <embeddedLabel>Partners</embeddedLabel> page in <token>tpm_portal</token>.

trans-unit.source: From the top-left corner, click <embeddedLabel><token>af_integration_full</token></embeddedLabel> logo to open the <embeddedLabel>Register Account</embeddedLabel> page.
trans-unit.target: From the top-left corner, click <embeddedLabel><token>af_integration_full</token></embeddedLabel> logo to open the <embeddedLabel>Register Account</embeddedLabel> page.

trans-unit.source: From the page, click <embeddedLabel>Register New Deployment</embeddedLabel> to register another <token>af_integration</token> subscription with the account you logged in with.
trans-unit.target: From the page, click <embeddedLabel>Register New Deployment</embeddedLabel> to register another <token>af_integration</token> subscription with the account you logged in with.

trans-unit.source: In the <embeddedLabel>Register New Deployment</embeddedLabel> page, enter the details for the <token>af_integration</token> subscription that you want to associate with the account.
trans-unit.target: In the <embeddedLabel>Register New Deployment</embeddedLabel> page, enter the details for the <token>af_integration</token> subscription that you want to associate with the account.

trans-unit.source: BizTalk Service Name
trans-unit.target: BizTalk Service Name

trans-unit.source: Enter the name for your <token>af_integration</token>.
trans-unit.target: Enter the name for your <token>af_integration</token>.

trans-unit.source: Issuer name
trans-unit.target: Issuer name

trans-unit.source: Enter the <token>ac2</token> Issuer Name used by your <token>af_integration</token>.
trans-unit.target: Enter the <token>ac2</token> Issuer Name used by your <token>af_integration</token>.

trans-unit.source: The <token>ac2</token> Issuer Name is available in the <externalLink><linkText>Azure Management Portal</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=213885</linkUri></externalLink> after you sign in.
trans-unit.target: The <token>ac2</token> Issuer Name is available in the <externalLink><linkText>Azure Management Portal</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=213885</linkUri></externalLink> after you sign in.

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>BizTalk Services: Issuer Name and Issuer Key</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=303941</linkUri></externalLink> lists the steps to retrieve the <token>ac2</token> Issuer Name.
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>BizTalk Services: Issuer Name and Issuer Key</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=303941</linkUri></externalLink> lists the steps to retrieve the <token>ac2</token> Issuer Name.

trans-unit.source: The correct Issuer Name must be specified.
trans-unit.target: The correct Issuer Name must be specified.

trans-unit.source: Issuer secret
trans-unit.target: Issuer secret

trans-unit.source: Enter the <token>ac2</token> Issuer Secret (Issuer Key) used by your <token>af_integration</token>.
trans-unit.target: Enter the <token>ac2</token> Issuer Secret (Issuer Key) used by your <token>af_integration</token>.

trans-unit.source: The <token>ac2</token> Issuer Secret is available in the <externalLink><linkText>Azure Management Portal</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=213885</linkUri></externalLink> after you sign in.
trans-unit.target: The <token>ac2</token> Issuer Secret is available in the <externalLink><linkText>Azure Management Portal</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=213885</linkUri></externalLink> after you sign in.

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>BizTalk Services: Issuer Name and Issuer Key</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=303941</linkUri></externalLink> lists the steps to retrieve the <token>ac2</token> Issuer Secret.
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>BizTalk Services: Issuer Name and Issuer Key</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=303941</linkUri></externalLink> lists the steps to retrieve the <token>ac2</token> Issuer Secret.

trans-unit.source: Click <embeddedLabel>Register</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Click <embeddedLabel>Register</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: Once you have registered a single account with multiple <token>af_integration</token> deployments, you can navigate between different deployments.
trans-unit.target: Once you have registered a single account with multiple <token>af_integration</token> deployments, you can navigate between different deployments.

trans-unit.source: To do so, go to the <token>tpm_portal</token> registration page by clicking the <embeddedLabel><token>af_integration_full</token></embeddedLabel> logo and then select the deployment you want to work with.
trans-unit.target: To do so, go to the <token>tpm_portal</token> registration page by clicking the <embeddedLabel><token>af_integration_full</token></embeddedLabel> logo and then select the deployment you want to work with.
